language.name: English
language.txtWelcome: Hello from Sony. What you hold in your hands is the future of reading. To experience this now, tap anywhere on the screen.
language.txtGuideAreaLang: Scegliere la lingua preferita e selezionare "OK". Nota: Le impostazioni del dispositivo possono essere modificate in seguito dal menu "Impostazioni".
language.txtCalibration1: Using the stylus, tap on the center of the target.
language.txtCalibration2: Calibration error detected. Please restart calibration process.
